en-US.summary: Learn about the principles of HashiCorp, which together describe the foundational characteristics of the company.
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask hashicorp principles to tell me a principle
Alexa, ask hashicorp principles about kindness
en-US.name: HashiCorp Principles
en-US.description:
An organization is driven by its people and culture. This skill informs you about the principles of HashiCorp, which together describe the foundational characteristics of the company. The principles provide a rubric by which we can make decisions and through a shared understanding we can act collectively in a consistent manner.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch HashiCorp Principles" or "Alexa, open HashiCorp Principles".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop".
